tool.name: Select genomes
tool.command:
wrapper.py divergence.select_taxa $logfile #if $genomes.value and 'galaxy.tools.parameters.basic.RuntimeValue' not in str($genomes.value): --genomes $genomes #end if
--genomes-file $genomesfile

param.name: genomes
param.label: Choose Genomes
param.help: Select between two and one hundred genomes for analysis, or provide external genomes not included in this list above. This list is synchronized daily with the Complete Microbial Genomes table at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genomes/lproks.cgi See the original table for alternate sorting and selection criteria.

tool.help:
This tool allows you to select genomes for analysis in the Genome-wide signatures of adaptive divergence pipeline.
No fewer than two and no more than one hundred genomes may be selected.
